bitcoinThreatModel.DESCRIPTION: A security review of the Bitcoin cryptocurrency
bitcoinThreatModel.TITLE: Bitcoin Threat Model
bitcoinThreatModel.QUOTE: With e-currency based on cryptographic proof, without the need to trust a third party middleman, money can be secure - and transactions effortless.

humanThreatModel.TITLE: Human Threat Model
humanThreatModel.QUOTE: The human threat model is intended to help humans better understand the threats to that they face and the tools available, and in active development, for defense.
